mapper.update: update account_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, mobile, `status`, create_user, create_time from account_user
mapper.insert: insert into account_user (user_name, mobile, `status`, create_user) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER})
